title: Welcome to Qi Shao's World
subtitle: Experience Another Person's Life Through the Blogs
description: I'm Qi Shao. A guy who has struggle for living. I have studied very hard and even forgotten to happy my life. I have experienced a terrible dark time but now I live in nice days! I always have passion to sing for my life and write a fantistic story of my life. I hope you can find a encouragement from my blogs. If not, I also hope this site can make you rest for a littel moment. Hope everyone (everybody visiting there and me) to have a great time and to always be glad for their futher. This day is sunny day! Hope the sunshine on you body!

items.title: Welcome to the blogs of Qi Shao
items.content_html: Thank you for your first visitation of my blogs, I don't have time now but I will update this blog on this evening, expect for your visitation at that moment!

items.title: Hello World
items.content_html:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
